name: Merah and Putih
description:
Your step-sister Putih, is an annoying little sister who loves to help out in the house. There is nothing wrong with being active to do the house chores, but the problem is, she could never do things right and would mess up everything she touches. It boils your anger even more one day when you realized that she accidentally destroyed your favourite dress while washing it. You had enough of her and decided to get rid of her once and for all…

● There are 4 dirty spots that Putih would need to clean up in every level
● Putih will randomly choose a dirty spot every round to clean up, players will then need to
predict which route that she will take and set up deadly traps along the way
● Players will be able to kill her by utilizing the various objects placed around the level.
● Different objects will create a different outcome when used differently with different objects.
● But not all objects are deadly towards Putih only, it could be deadly towards the player too!
● Putih will go back and have a rest after cleaning one dirty spot, giving players a short amount of time to prepare for the next attempt.
● If players do not manage to kill Putih before she cleans the last dirty spot and leaves
the level, the player fails and would need to retry again.

RareBird Games is a team that consists of a balance number of programmers, designers and artists. Each with a passionate heart to come together to create a game that will set itself apart from mainstream games, providing a fresh new experience towards the players. We are also not afraid to take risks as “Nothing is Impossible” is the team’s motto.
